title: Meta Ads Specialist
job_overview:
As our Meta Ads Specialist, you'll design, manage, and optimize Meta (Facebook & Instagram) ad campaigns—pushing boundaries and maximizing ROI across brand awareness and conversion funnels.

Key Responsibilities
Develop and execute full-funnel Meta Ads campaigns (copy, visuals, targeting, retargeting, budgets)
Create compelling ad copy and collaborate with designers to produce high-performing creatives 
Set up and optimize audiences, bidding strategies, and budgeting for improved ROAS 
Track, analyze, and report key metrics (CPA, CTR, conversion, ROAS); A/B test continuously
Ensure accurate pixel and conversion API setup
Stay current on Meta Ads best practices, trends, and platform updates
Optionally support lead gen via Meta Job Ads and lead forms 

Must-Have Qualifications
2+ years of hands-on experience with Meta Ads campaigns
Proven track record hitting performance targets (CPA, ROAS, CTR) 
Proficient in Meta Ads Manager, audience segmentation, and pixel tracking
Strong analytical skills—able to interpret data and make strategic decisions
Excellent copywriting and communication abilities
Comfortable collaborating within cross-functional teams (e.g. designers, analysts)
